name: Rage Tennis
description:
MOVE KEYS: WASD

HIT BALL: SPACEBAR

INSTRUCTIONS:

Rage Tennis is a game where you get points by making the ball bounce off the walls as many times as possible, without hitting the lower wall, or else you lose.

The points will be stored in the cloud, and everyone can add points!

THE GAME IS ALSO AVAIABLE IN SCRATCH!

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/803477425/
